column5: Thinking of taking a weekend and trying some Walleye on the English River below Ear Falls. Anybody got a report on how the action has been?
been slow....water high and muddy. should clear up next month. catching a few fish about 15 miles down river in area of dead mans rapids.

Are the Bullheads hitting good? Every since I was a little shoeless boy in Missouri I have loved to catch Bullheads. I caught a Walleye once but the guy in the boat with me wouldnt dip it so I just stick to catching those whiskered beautys.
